categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: In the aftermath of the Battle of Hoth during the Galactic Civil War, a GR-75 medium transport supported the main Alliance Fleet at the Rebel Alliance's secret rendezvous point beyond the Galactic Rim. The transport was commanded by a Human male and participated in a skirmish after an Imperial Strike-class cruiser happened upon the Alliance Fleet's position.
